Carbure est un outil d√©velopp√© par le: Carbure is a tool developed by the French Ministry of Ecological Transition that allows actors in the sector to easily exchange information about the sustainability of biofuels circulating in France. The tool also provides anonymous public statistics about biofuels incorporated into fossil fuels in France.
